cello.alt.servlet.script
Interface JavaScript

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaScriptResource, MultiResourceScript
public interface JavaScript

Interface defining a module Script used in Rhino. It provides methods to check for updates (update method), evaluate the script in a particular scope, and to add another script as a dependency.

Author:
Marcello

Method Detail

update

boolean update(org.mozilla.javascript.Context cx)
               throws java.io.IOException
Evaluates this script if it was modified. Also evaluates any child scripts, if necessary.

Parameters:
cx - javascript Context
Returns:
whether the script was actually updated
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem loading the script.

evaluate

java.lang.Object evaluate(org.mozilla.javascript.Context cx,
                          org.mozilla.javascript.Scriptable scope)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Forces this script to be evaluated.

Parameters:
cx - The JavaScript Context
scope - The JavaScript Scope
Returns:
the result of evaluation
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem loading the script.

addDependency

void addDependency(JavaScript parent,
                   boolean cascadeReload)
Adds this script as a parent of this object. This is used to remove children that are no longer dependent.

Parameters:
parent - the parent JavaScript
cascadeReload - specifies whether the current script needs to reload when the dependency does

getScriptLoader

ScriptLoader getScriptLoader()
Get the script loader associated with this script.

Returns:
the ScriptLoader

getResource

Resource getResource(java.lang.String path)
                     throws ResourceException
Gets a resource relative to this script. This can be a relative path or an absolute path starting with /. This method is similar to Class.getResource(java.lang.String).

Parameters:
path - the path to this
Returns:
the resource object
Throws:
ResourceException - if the resource could not be loaded

getEvaluationTime

long getEvaluationTime()
Returns the last evaluation time for this script

Returns:
the time in ms
See Also:
System.currentTimeMillis()

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Returns the script's full name in module.Script format.

Returns:
the script name

getModule

Module getModule()
Get the script's module.

the module
